pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Acapela Downloader but in PythonTranslated over to Python from C#: https://github.com/weespin/WillFromAfarDownloader# How to useFirst download the pip package.```pip install acapela-downloader-py```Then use the 'generate_audio' function from the 'acapela' library``` pythonfrom acapela import generate_audiogenerate_audio("Great Test", "enu_willhappy_22k_ns.bvcu", "output.mp3")```## Other StuffIf you find any code from StupidTown in my package feel free to make a pull request.
